say.name: KID:
say.says: Wow you're almost as good as Kate was, mister!

say.name: KID:
say.says: You're welcome! Kate was my babysitter. She would always make us play the quiet game, and the winner would get 5 dollars!

say.name: KID:
say.says: It sure was! When she moved away, She said she was going to miss us a lot, but she said she'd send us postcards from the west coast!

say.name: YOU:
say.says: Wow, that's sure nice of her.

say.name: KID:
say.says: Yeah! She hasn't sent one yet, but I'm sure she'll get to it one day.
